articles.title: Live FTSE 100 slides again after week of market turmoil - live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: The FTSE 100 has dropped again, rounding off a tumultuous week for global markets amid fears of interest rate rises and the looming threat of war in Europe.
articles.content:

Britain and the EU are said to be preparing sanctions on new Russian gas projects in retaliation for any attack on Ukraine.

articles.author: Amitabh Sinha
articles.title: Explained: BA.2 sub-variant of Omicron – not new, rise mainly in Europe - The Indian Express
articles.description: What is BA.2 Omicron variant: Several countries have reported the discovery of BA.2, a sub-variant of Omicron. What do we know about this sub-variant? Is it present in India? Is it more harmful?
articles.content: In the last couple of weeks, there has been a noticeable increase in the discovery of BA.2 sub-variant of Omicron from several countries, leading to fresh worries about the possibility of another sur… [+4125 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Australia has offered to export more liquefied natural gas to Europe in light of Ukraine tensions. Here's why - ABC News
articles.description: Australia offers to provide liquefied natural gas to "friends and allies" in Europe, should Moscow decide to cut off energy supplies in light of Ukraine tensions.
articles.content: Australia has offered to provide additional liquefied natural gas (LNG) to "friends and allies" in Europe, should Moscow decide to cut off energy supplies to European countries heavily reliant on gas… [+7971 chars]
